summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 12623 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Bell Street, from Western Avenue to Elliott Avenue; Battery Street from Western Avenue to Elliott Avenue; Cedar Street from Western Avenue to Elliott Avenue; Clay Street from Western Avenue to Elliott Avenue; Broad Street from Western Avenue to Elliott Avenue; and Elliott Avenue from Bell Street to Broad Street; by grading and regrading, planking and replanking, and side-walking and re-side-walking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 456 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by an act of the Legislature of State of Washington entitled An act authorizing the issuance and sale of bonds by cities, to pay for local improvements, providing for the payment thereof, and declaring an emergency." approved March 14, 1899, and Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899" approved July 19, 1905.
